titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for grants to enable States to carry out activities to reduce administrative costs and burdens in health care.
Reducing Administrative Costs and Burdens in Health Care Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
